read-write: :Property Numbered Default name ∇ result ← Get instructions ∇ ∇ Set arguments instructions ∇ :EndProperty Bar
read-only: :Property Numbered Default Bar ∇ result ← Get instructions ∇ :EndProperty Bar
write-only: :Property Numbered Default Bar ∇ Set arguments instructions ∇ :EndProperty Bar

read-write: type this[type index] {  get{ instructions }  set{ instructions } }
type opIndex(type index) { instructions }  type opIndexAssign(type value, type index) { instructions }
write-only: type opIndexAssign(type value, type index) { instructions }

read-only: - (id)objectAtIndexedSubscript:(NSUInteger)index { instructions return value; } or - (id)objectForKeyedSubscript:(id)index { instructions return value; }

read-write: subscript (index : type) -> returntype { get { instructions } set«(newIndex)» { instructions } }
bracket_name alias "[]" (index: TYPE): TYPE assign set_item do instructions end  set_item (value: TYPE; index: TYPE): do instructions end
read-only: bracket_name alias "[]" (index: TYPE): TYPE do instructions end

read-write: def __getitem__(self, index):  Tab ↹ instructions  Tab ↹ return value  def __setitem__(self, index, value):  Tab ↹ instructions
read-only: def __getitem__(self, index):  Tab ↹ instructions  Tab ↹ return value

read-write: Default Property Item(Index As type) As type  Get  instructions  End Get  Set(ByVal Value As type)  instructions  End Set  End Property
read-only: Default ReadOnly Property Item(Index As type) As type  Get  instructions  End Get  End Property
write-only: Default WriteOnly Property Item(Index As type) As type  Set(ByVal Value As type)  instructions  End Set  End Property

read-write: «our «type »»«multi »method postcircumfix:<[ ]> is rw («$self: » type $index) { instructions ... return value; } or  «our «type »»«multi »method postcircumfix:<{ }> is rw  («$self: » type $key) { instructions ... return value; }
read-only: «our «type »»«multi »method postcircumfix:<[ ]>(«$self: » type $index) { instructions ... return value; } or  «our «type »»«multi »method postcircumfix:<{ }> («$self: » type $key) { instructions ... return value; }

read-write: def [](index)  instructions  expression resulting in return value  end  def []=(index, value)  instructions  end
read-only: def [](index)  instructions  expression resulting in return value  end

read-write: member this.Item with get(index) = expression and set index value = expression
write-only: member this.Item with set index value = expression

read-write: pro[index «as type»] as type Tab ↹ get Tab ↹Tab ↹ instructions Tab ↹Tab ↹ return value Tab ↹ set Tab ↹Tab ↹ instructions
read-only: get[index «as type»] as type Tab ↹ instructions Tab ↹ return value
write-only: set[index «as type»] as type Tab ↹ instructions
